headline: Japan's Tokyo Gas to buy stake in Texas Shale from Chevron, Nikkei reports
summary: Japan's biggest city gas provider Tokyo Gas will buy a stake in a shale gas development in Texas from U.S. energy giant Chevron in a deal estimated to be worth tens of billions of yen, the Nikkei reported on Tuesday.

raw.headline: Japan's Tokyo Gas to buy stake in Texas Shale from Chevron, Nikkei reports
raw.summary: Japan's biggest city gas provider Tokyo Gas will buy a stake in a shale gas development in Texas from U.S. energy giant Chevron in a deal estimated to be worth tens of billions of yen, the Nikkei reported on Tuesday.

headline: Chevron Announces Sale of Majority Interest in its East Texas Gas Assets
summary: Chevron U.S.A. Inc., a subsidiary of Chevron Corporation , announced that it has closed on a transaction to sell a 70% interest in its East Texas gas assets to an affiliate of TG Natural Resources...
